title: Bijan Kangarloo
text: Bijan "Justin" Kangarloo (, born February 10, 1985 in <a href="Calgary">Calgary</a>, <a href="Alberta">Alberta</a>) is a <a href="Canadians">Canadian</a>-<a href="Iran">Iran</a>ian <a href="cross-country%20skiing%20%28sport%29">cross-country skier</a> who has competed since 2003. Kangarloo was born in <a href="Calgary">Calgary</a>, <a href="Alberta">Alberta</a>, Canada, to an Iranian father.
